description: Ministry of Water Supply & Drainage - Acquisition of Land in Naboda D/S/D - Dodangoda Kaluthara Dist. for the construction of Access Road for Naboda Water Purification Plant.Acquisition of Land in Naboda D/S/D - Dodangoda Kaluthara Dist. for the construction of Naboda Water Purification Plant for the Kaluthara Integrated Water Supply Scheme. Acquisition of Land in Vijithapura D/S/D Ipolagama A'pura Dist. for the Construction of the Intake & the Pump House for Kekirawa Water Supply Scheme
